dict.acceptation: 队，组；团队；工作组；（野鸭等）群，同胎仔；
协同工作；合作；把（牛马等）联套在车上；

sent.orig: The first game team defeated the team, defending champion team has defeated Team Hubei.
sent.trans: 揭幕战山西队战胜吉林队，卫冕冠军广东队战胜了湖北队。

sent.orig: Reporting team, Treasury Team, Credit Team, Legal Department, WD Department A, Operation Department.
sent.trans: 报表组，资金组，信贷部，法律部，人力资源部，A部门，相关业务部门。

sent.orig: Reporting team, Treasury Team, Credit Team, Department, WD Department, G&A, Operation Department.
sent.trans: 报表组，资金组，信贷部，法律部，人力资源部，G&A部门，相关业务部门。

sent.orig: Each team may enter one team leader, one coach and one team doctor.
sent.trans: （一）参赛单位可报领队1人、教练1人、医生1人。

sent.orig: After defeating team, the Italian team will contest for the Worldchampion with team.
sent.trans: 击败德国队后，意大利队将和法国队争夺冠军。
